title: Login Bug?
body: I'm having kinda a weird problem. I can log into Riot's website fine and the credentials for my account are accepted, but when I try to log into it on the Riot Launcher it says there's a problem. I can log into other NA accounts fine, and this problem just started after the most recent patch. I think it's related to the removal of region select. Any thoughts?

replies.body:
Hi there. Have you updated that account to have a globally unique username? As of yesterday, if your username is not globally unique you won't be able to log into League. Here are some resources that may be helpful.

https://update-account.riotgames.com/
https://support-leagueoflegends.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/360037264394

Hi there, this is Truce typing. I'm completely locked out of the account now. I have updated the username, I updated it again yesterday when I thought that might be the problem. I've tried both usernames and can not log into the client or website. I'm not really sure what to do now. I can't get into it through the update username link anymore.

dunno but if i log in it says "an unexpected error occured". i played one game fine and all but in my second game i got thrown out of the game restarted the client and cant login anymore. if i get reported for that im vomiting.
Still having the issue. I can't log into the site, I can only get into my account from the update username link given to me after my failed login attempt. Bump? :)
